items.sentence: Tom can meet you at the airport if you let him know your arrival time.
No one has the right to tell me what I can and can\'t do with my body.
She advised him not to drive too fast, but he wouldn\'t listen to her.
I\'ve already drunk half a bottle of wine while I was waiting for you.
I\'ve heard that the most beautiful women in the world live in Boston.
If you listen carefully to my instructions, it\'ll save you some time.
Tom hasn\'t been able to come to school because he\'s in the hospital.
Tom invited me to Mary\'s party even though she didn\'t want me there.
Tom said he\'ll go home as soon as he finishes doing what he\'s doing.
Tom read somewhere that short people need more sleep than tall people.
Tom ruined his favorite shirt by washing it in water that was too hot.
Tom seems to enjoy just sitting on the dock and watching the seagulls.
Tom stepped out of the bathroom with a towel wrapped around his waist.
Today my wife and I are celebrating our twentieth wedding anniversary.
Tom takes a quick jog around the block every morning before breakfast.
Tom\'s mother forced him to go outside even though he didn\'t want to.
I don\'t care what the doctor says. I\'m going to eat whatever I want.
It\'s difficult for me to understand French when it\'s spoken quickly.
I\'ve got better things to do than to keep track of what Tom\'s doing.
For the lack of something better to do, Tom started cleaning his room.
